content: अविषय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unperceived, invisible, beyond the reach of the senses. {@--2@} Insensible. {@--3@} Disregarding objects of sense; °मनसां यतीनां <ls>M. 1. 1.</ls> --यः {@--1@} Absence, disappearance; रवेरविषये किं न प्रदीपस्य प्रकाशनं <ls>H. 2. 79.</ls> {@--2@} Not an object of (anything), not within the reach of, beyond, transcending; न कश्चिद्धीमतामविषयो नाम <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; सकलवचनानामविषयः <ls>Māl. 1. 30</ls> beyond the reach (power) of words; सौमित्रेरपि पत्रिणामविषये तत्र प्रिये क्वासि भोः <ls>U. 3. 45.</ls> {@--3@} Disregard of the objects of sense.
